body_html:
@ry @yangjunpro
Regarding the model_average_device_setter: Used the ps_strategy in replica_device_setter

Regarding the tests in tensorflow/contrib/model_average/tests/simple: remove this and add two tests by using tensorflow.python.platform.test .

Regarding the location of this code: already moved to tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/opt/python/training.

The "MODEL_VARIALBES assumption" is fixed.
body_text:
@ry  @yangjunpro
Regarding the model_average_device_setter:  Used the ps_strategy in replica_device_setter
Regarding the tests in tensorflow/contrib/model_average/tests/simple:  remove this and add two tests by using tensorflow.python.platform.test .
Regarding the location of this code: already moved to tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/opt/python/training.
The "MODEL_VARIALBES assumption"  is fixed.
body:
@ry  @yangjunpro 
Regarding the model_average_device_setter:  Used the ps_strategy in replica_device_setter

Regarding the tests in tensorflow/contrib/model_average/tests/simple:  remove this and add two tests by using tensorflow.python.platform.test .

Regarding the location of this code: already moved to tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/opt/python/training. 

The "MODEL_VARIALBES assumption"  is fixed.
